# resourceOptions

**Instance Property**

The options for resources created by the heap.

## Declaration

```swift
var resourceOptions: MTLResourceOptions { get }
```

## Discussion

The value of this property aggregates the values of [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLHeap/storageMode], [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLHeap/cpuCacheMode], and [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLHeap/hazardTrackingMode].

## Checking a heap’s permanent configuration

- **device**: The device object that created the heap.
- **type**: The heap’s type.
- **storageMode**: The heap’s storage mode.
- **cpuCacheMode**: The heap’s CPU cache mode.
- **hazardTrackingMode**: The heap’s hazard tracking mode.
